posts._title: James Ivory – The Remains of the Day (1993)
posts.title: The Remains of the Day
posts.excerpt: Quote:A rule bound head butler’s world of manners and decorum in the household he maintains is tested by the arrival of a housekeeper who falls in love with him in pre-WWII Britain. The possibility of romance and his master’s cultivation of ties with the Nazi cause challenge his carefully maintained veneer of servitude.
